trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around November 19th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my family where driveing the back roads home when my daughter saw a orange fire colored ball floating over and around the trees like it was looking for something.it moved very slow and was very bright.in blink it was gone and reapear 50 a hundred feet from where it just was.we watched it for about 20 mins and then I started driving home as they watched the light on the moutain.It was deffantly weird to see the lght where there arent any roads and cars and trucks can not float above trees.yes it is a loggin raod but where this light was there ant no roads.
